code: import React from'react';import'./announcement_section.css';import announcement from'../../assets/icons/announcement.svg';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function formatDate(date){return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString("en-US",{year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit',second:'2-digit'});}const Announcement_section=_ref=>{let{header,icon,contents}=_ref;const listItems=contents.slice(0,10).map((content,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"announcement_section__contents-header",to:'/posts/'+content._id,children:content.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"announcement_section__contents-content",children:content.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"announcement_section__contents-date",children:formatDate(content.entryDate)})]},index));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"announcement_section__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"announcement_section__header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:header})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"announcement_section__contents",children:listItems})]});};export default Announcement_section;
